text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump 1 person who tests positive goes to a mother's day church gathering. Exposes 180 other people also there. What would possibly 5 people do at a crowded rally with no one wearing a mask? #compassionforothers #StayAtHome #COVID19 https://t.co/LQ3FEiEfk4
